meanings.definition: The information displayed on a screen or other device.
meanings.sent1: The readouts on the monitor showed the patient's heart rate.
meanings.sent2: I checked the readouts on the dashboard to see how fast we were going.
meanings.sent3: The readouts on the scale told me I need to lay off the cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her face was like a readout, revealing every emotion she felt.
meanings.sent5: The readouts of the weather forecast were clear and easy to understand.

meanings.definition: The act of obtaining information from a readout.
meanings.sent1: She quickly made sense of the readouts from the machine.
meanings.sent2: The technician's job involved analyzing the readouts for any anomalies.
meanings.sent3: The detective studied the readouts, searching for clues to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a readout, processing data at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The readouts provided valuable insights into the experiment's results.

meanings.definition: To display or show information on a screen or other device.
meanings.sent1: The scientist will readouts the data on the screen for everyone to see.
meanings.sent2: Please readouts the instructions clearly so everyone can understand.
meanings.sent3: The magician readouts the secret code on the screen, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: The artist readouts her masterpiece on the gallery wall for all to admire.
meanings.sent5: The teacher readouts the lesson plan on the board for the students to follow.
